item.title: Recycling the Old Mac
item.description:
I recently bid farewell to my 1987 Macintosh II computer. It had been in my basement for over 15 years, and thanks to Apple’s recycling program, it was finally time to part ways. My old Mac had sentimental value. Initially, I held onto it as a backup when I upgraded to a Performa. Then, there was the unforgettable “Talking Moose” program created by Dr. Steven Halls. This program, utilizing the Macintalk voice feature, displayed a talking moose with a Canadian accent that would share witty remarks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recycling-the-old-mac/
